description.value:
Your study of infiltration and mystique help you to learn spells help you uncover secrets and dispatch threats. You can prepare these spells when you are the appropriate Bard level.

Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplExpeditiou]{Expeditious Retreat}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHex0000000]{Hex}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Sgjrf8qqv97CCWM4]{Magic Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj]{Pass without Trace}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GSvLWcdCZLQkilXT]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplElementalW]{Elemental Weapon}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplStoneskin0]{Stoneskin}
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wXzkqpeFP8eWgJzK]{Antilife Shell}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDestructiv]{Destructive Wave}
